author: sbaldu
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements an association map based on SoA blocks. In order to provide the accessors to the map properties' and content, the PR also enables the definition of SoA view methods.

#### PR validation:

The PR includes a test of the construction and fill of the map and checks the correctness of the content and the accessor methods.

FYI @felicepantaleo
title: Implement heterogeneous Association Map based on SoA blocks
